name: Soldier's Syringe
description: +15% attack speed (+15% per stack).

name: Tougher Times
description: 15% chance (+15% per stack) to block damage.

name: Monster Tooth
description: Enemies drop healing orbs that heal 8 + 2% of max health (+2% per stack).

name: Lens Maker's Glasses
description: +10% chance (+10% per stack) to critically strike.

name: Paul's Goat Hoof
description: +14% movement speed (+14% per stack).

name: Bustling Fungus
description: Standing still heals allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack) for 4.5% of max health (+2.25% per stack).

name: Crowbar
description: Enemies above 90% health take +75% more damage (+75% per stack).

name: Tri-Tip Dagger
description: 10% chance (+10% per stack) to bleed enemies for 240% base damage.

name: Warbanner
description: Drop banners when leveling up and starting teleporters, grants +30% attack and movement speed to allies within 16m (+8m per stack).

name: Cautious Slug
description: Heal +3hp/s (+3hp per stack) while outside of combat.

name: Personal Shield Generator
description: Gain a shield equal to 8% of max health (+8% per stack). Recharges after 9s outside of danger.

name: Medkit
description: Heal 20 + 5% of max health (+5% per stack) 2s after taking damage.

name: Gasoline
description: Killing an enemy ignites enemies within 12m, (+4m per stack) dealing 150% base damage. Burning enemies take 150% base damage (+75% per stack) per tick.

name: Stun Grenade
description: 5% chance (+5% per stack) to stun enemies on hit for 2s.

name: Bundle of Fireworks
description: Activating an interactable launches 8 fireworks (+4 per stack) that deal 300% base damage.

name: Energy Drink
description: +25% movement speed (+25% per stack) while sprinting.

name: Backup Magazine
description: +1 charge (+1 per stack) to your Secondary skill.

name: Sticky Bomb
description: 5% chance (+5% per stack) to attach a bomb to enemies that detonates for 180% total damage.

name: Rusted Key
description: A hidden lockbox will appear somewhere on the next stage with an 80% chance to drop an Uncommon item and a 20% chance to drop a Legendary item. Consumed on use.

name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
description: +20% damage (+20% per stack) dealt to stage bosses.

name: Topaz Brooch
description: +15 temporary barrier (+15 per stack) per kill.

name: Focus Crystal
description: +20% damage (+20% per stack) dealt to enemies within 13m.

name: Bison Steak
description: +25 max health (+25hp per stack).

name: Repulsion Armor Plate
description: Reduce damage taken by 5 (+5 per stack).

name: Mocha
description: +7.5% attack speed (+7.5% per stack), +7% movement speed (+7% per stack).

name: Power Elixir
description: Heal for 75% of max health when below 25% of max health. Consumed on use.

name: Delicate Watch
description: +20% damage (+20% per stack), consumed when below 25% of max health.

name: Oddly Shaped Opal
description: +100 armor (+100 per stack) outside of danger.

name: Roll of Pennies
description: Grants 3 gold (+3 per stack) after taking damage from an enemy. Scales with time.

name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
description: 10% chance to fire a missile dealing 300% total damage (+300% per stack).

name: Will-o'-the-wisp
description: Killing an enemy creates a lava pillar with a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius, dealing 350% base damage (+280% per stack).

name: Hopoo Feather
description: +1 jump (+1 per stack).

name: Ukulele
description: 25% chance to arc lightning between 3 enemies (+2 per stack) within 20m (+2m per stack) of each other, dealing 80% total damage.

name: Leeching Seed
description: Heal 1hp (+1hp per stack) per hit.

name: Predatory Instincts
description: Critical strikes boost attack speed by 12% (+24% per stack) for 3s. Capped at 36%.

name: Red Whip
description: +30% movement speed (+30% per stack) outside of combat.

name: Old War Stealthkit
description: Become invisible and gain 40% movement speed for 5s when below 25% max health, 30s (-50% per stack) cooldown.

name: Harvester's Scythe
description: +5% critical strike chance, critical strikes heal for 8hp (+4hp per stack).

name: Fuel Cell
description: +1 equipment charge (+1 per stack), reduced equipment cooldown by 15%. (+15% per stack)

name: Infusion
description: Killing enemies increases max health by 1hp, (+1hp per stack) capped at 100 (+100 per stack).

name: Bandolier
description: 18% chance (+10% per stack) for enemies to drop ammo packs, ammo packs reset skill cooldowns.

name: Berzerker's Pauldron
description: Killing 4 enemies (3 pre-DLC) within 1s boosts movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100% for 6s (+4s per stack).

name: Rose Buckler
description: +30 armor (+30 per stack) while sprinting.

name: Runald's Band
description: Hits dealing more than 400% damage slow the target by 80% for 3s (+3s per stack) and deal an aditional 250% total damage (+250% per stack). 10s cooldown.

name: Kjaro's Band
description: Hits dealing more than 400% damage deal an aditional 300% total damage over time. 10s cooldown.

name: Chronobauble
description: Slow enemies by 60% for 2s (+2s per stack) on hit.

name: Wax Quail
description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).

name: Old Guillotine
description: Elite enemies below 13% health (+13% per stack) die instantly.

name: War Horn
description: Activating an equipment boosts attack speed by 70% for 8s (+4s per stack).

name: Lepton Daisy
description: Heals allies within the teleporter for 50% of max health 1 time (+1 per stack) per teleporter.

name: Razorwire
description: Taking damage hits up to 5 enemies (+2 per stack) within 25m (+10m per stack) for 160% damage.

name: Ghor's Tome
description: 4% chance (+4% per stack) for enemies to drop treasure worth 25 gold. Scales with time.

name: Squid Polyp
description: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret which shoots at 100% attack speed (+100% per stack), lasts 30s.

name: Death Mark
description: Enemies inflicted with at least 4 debuffs take 50% more damage for 7s (+7s per stack).

name: Hunter's Harpoon
description: Killing an enemy increases movement speed by 125% for 1s (+0.5s per stack).

name: Ignition Tank
description: Fire deals 300% more damage (+300% per stack).

name: Shuriken
description: Using a Primary skill throws a shuriken dealing 400% base damage (+400% per stack). Capped at 3 shurikens, 10s reload.

name: Shipping Request Form
description: A delivery will be on the next stage containing two items, each item has a 79% chance to be Common, 20% chance to be Uncommon, and 1% chance to be Legendary.

name: Brilliant Behemoth
description: All attacks explode with a 4m (+2.5m per stack) radius and deal 60% more damage.

name: Ceremonial Dagger
description: Killing an enemy creates 3 homing daggers that deal 150% base damage. (+150% per stack)

name: Frost Relic
description: Killing an enemy deals 1,200% damage per second to nearby enemies and slows them by 80% for 1.5s. Damage radius grows by 2m per kill, capped at 18m. (+12m per stack)

name: Happiest Mask
description: 7% chance to spawn a ghost ally after killing an enemy. Deals 1,500% damage, lasts 30s. (+30s per stack)

name: H3AD-5T v2
description: Increases jump height, hold 'interact' to slam. Slamming creates a 5m-100m explosion dealing 1,000%-10,000% base damage scaling with slam distance. 10s cooldown. (-50% per stack)

name: N'Kuahana's Opinion
description: Store 100% of healing (+100% per stack) as Soul Energy. When Soul Energy hits 10% of max health, fire a homing skull dealing 250% of Soul Energy as damage.

name: Unstable Tesla Coil
description: Fire lightning that hits 3 enemies (+2 per stack) for 200% base damage every 0.5s. 10s cooldown.

name: 57 Leaf Clover
description: All random effects are rolled +1 time (+1 per stack) for a favorable outcome.

name: Sentient Meat Hook
description: 20% chance (+20% per stack) on hit to fire homing hooks that pull up to 10 enemies (+5 per stack) together, dealing 100% total damage. Hooks are fired from the target enemy.

name: Alien Head
description: All skill cooldowns reduced by 25% (+25% per stack).

name: Soulbound Catalyst
description: Killing an enemy reduces equipment cooldowns by 4s (+2s per stack).

name: Dio's Best Friend
description: Grants +1 extra life (+1 per stack), gain 3s of invulnerability after ressurection. Consumed on use.

name: Hardlight Afterburner
description: Gain +2 Utility skill charges (+2 per stack), reduces Utility skill cooldowns by 33%.

name: Wake of Vultures
description: Killing an elite enemy grants the player that enemy's elite ability for 8s (+5s per stack).

name: Brainstalks
description: Killing an elite enemy reduces all skill cooldowns to 0.5s for 4s (+4s per stack).

name: Rejuvination Rack
description: Heal 100% (+100% per stack) more.

name: Aegis
description: Healing while at full health grants temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount healed.

name: Shattering Justice
description: Reduce enemy armor by 60 for 8s (+8s per stack) after hitting them 5 times.

name: Resonance Disc
description: Killing 4 enemies in 7s charges the Resonance Disc. Deals 300% base damage (+300% per stack), pierces enemies it doesn't kill, then explodes for 1,000% base damage (+1,000% per stack). Returns to the player and pierces enemies on the way dealing 300% base damage (+300% per stack).

name: Interstellar Desk Plant
description: Killing an enemy drops a healing plant after 5s. Plants heal allies within 10m (+5m per stack) for 5% of max health every 0.5s. Lasts 10s

name: Laser Scope
description: Critical strikes deal +100% damage (+100% per stack).

name: Pocket I.C.B.M.
description: Missile items and equipment fire 2 additional missiles, missiles deal +50% more damage per additional stack.

name: Spare Drone Parts
description: Summon Col. Droneman (+1 per stack). Drones gain +50% attack speed and cooldown reduction (+50% per stack), and 10% chance to fire a missile dealing 300% total damage on hit. Drones gain a chain gun that fires 6 bullets dealing 100% damage, bullets bounce to up to 2 enemies.

name: Symbiotic Scorpion
description: 100% chance to permanently reduce armor by 2 (+2 per stack) on hit.

name: Ben's Rain Coat
description: Prevents 1 debuff (+1 per stack) and grants temporary barrier for 10% of max health, 5s cooldown.

name: Bottled Chaos
description: Trigger 1 random extra equipment effect (+1 per stack) when using an equipment.

name: Titanic Knurl
description: +40% max health (+40 per stack), +1.6hp per second base health regeneration (+1.6 per stack).

name: Queen's Gland
description: Summon 1 Beetle Guard (+1 per stack) every 30s, deals 300% damage and has 100% health.

name: Halcyon Seed
description: Summons Aurelionite before a boss fight, deals 100% damage (+50% per stack) and has 100% health (+100% per stack).

name: Little Disciple
description: Fire a homing wisp dealing 300% damage (+300% per stack) every 1.6s while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.

name: Pearl
description: +10% max health (+10% per stack).

name: Irradiant Pearl
description: +10% health, regeneration, movement speed, damage, attack speed, critical strike chance, and armor.

name: Genesis Loop
description: Explode when below 25% max health dealing 6,000% base damage. 30 / 2s (+1 per stack) cooldown.

name: Molten Perforator
description: 10% chance on hit to fire 3 magma balls from the target dealing 300% damage (+300% per stack) each.

name: Shatterspleen
description: +5% critical strike chance. Critical strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage, bleeding enemies explode dealing 400% damage (+400% per stack) + 15% of their max health (+15% per stack).

name: Mired Urn
description: While in combat, deal 100% damage to 1 nearby enemy (+1 per stack), inflict them with tar, and heal 100% of the damage dealt.

name: Charged Perforator
description: 10% chance to strike lightning on hit dealing 500% damage (+500% per stack).

name: Empathy Cores
description: Summon 2 Solus Probes every 30s, Probes gain +100% damage (+100% per stack) per ally.

name: Planula
description: Heal 15hp (+15 per stack) after taking damage.

name: Defense Nucleus
description: Killing an elite monster summons an Alpha Construct that deals 300% damage and has 300% health. Capped at 4. (+4 per stack)
